titles.title: To amend the Taiwan Allies International Protection and Enhancement Initiative (TAIPEI) Act of 2019 to provide that the United States, as a member of any international organizations, should oppose any attempts by the Peopleâ€™s Republic of China to resolve Taiwanâ€™s status by distorting the decisions, language, policies, or procedures of the organization, and for other purposes.

To amend the Taiwan Allies International Protection and Enhancement Initiative (TAIPEI) Act of 2019 to provide that the United States, as a member of any international organization, should oppose any attempts by the People's Republic of China to resolve Taiwan's status by distorting the decisions, language, policies, or procedures of the organization, and for other purposes.
Taiwan International Solidarity Act
Taiwan International Solidarity Act
Taiwan International Solidarity Act
Taiwan International Solidarity Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Mr. Mast moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2416.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
